% advanced hyphenation

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\csdef{hyph_version}{ngerman}
%\csdef{hyph_version}{ngerman-x-latest} % error
%\csdef{hyph_version}{ngerman-x-20080601} % error

% set hyphenation
\csdef{set_hyphenation}{%
    \RequirePackage[ngerman=\csuse{hyph_version}]{hyphsubst}
    }

% log hyphenation
\csdef{log_hyphenation}{%
    \typeout{Used hyphsubst:^^J% Ausgabe in Terminal und Log-Datei
        version=\csuse{hyph_version}^^J}%
    }
